name: BasketBaller
description:
Game Name:BasketBaller

How to play: Simply drag the ball to shoot

I took a course at my university and this is one of my assignments. The instructor asked us to create a ball-playing game using unity, as much as a basketball player myself, came to this idea inspired by the facebook basketball mini game.

This project was originally designed for my iphone se, but I've always wanted to port my games into a more convenient implementation method, originally I wanted to try Unity Web Player but it's getting removed(oh well), so I built for webGL instead!

That makes up the story for this game fellas, if you felt the need to contact me for whatever reasons you can reach me at 410221009@gms.ndhu.edu.tw. Thanks for reading this !
